name: Data Subject
definition: Any natural person to whom personal data relates

name: Data Controller
definition: Entity that determines purposes and means of personal data processing

name: Data Processor
definition: Entity that processes personal data on behalf of a controller

name: Data Protection Officer
definition: Individual designated to monitor GDPR compliance

name: Joint Controller
definition: Multiple entities jointly determining processing purposes and means

name: Sub-Processor
definition: Processor that further processes data on behalf of primary processor

name: EU Representative
definition: Entity designated to handle data protection matters for non-EU controllers
